project.title: The Newspaper
project.description: In a pristine 1950s suburb, a newlywed discovers cryptic puzzles in the daily newspaper that hint at a buried town secret and her husband‚Äôs past. As the clues unravel, so does her reality. The Newspaper is a suspenseful descent into appearances, trust, and the quiet power of uncovering the truth.

Production: Double J Films Limited

project.title: Fraqua Vive
project.description:
I was commissioned to direct a dynamic 15-second TV spot for Fraqua, a water bottle designed by professional boxer Frank Ripley. Despite his young age, Frank developed an innovative solution for boxers -allowing them to hydrate without removing their gloves, tackling a unique challenge in the sport.

To bring this to life, we focused on capturing Frank in action, highlighting the intensity of his training. We played with dramatic lighting and cinematic composition to emphasize the raw energy and focus of a professional boxer. The result? A visually striking and high-impact piece that reflects the spirit of Fraqua.

drafts.caption:
üé¨ Fraqua Vive (2023)

Client: Fraqua
Production: Storyflow Entertainment Limited

‚Äî
Colour Grading, Edit by @lemonpoststudio
Directed by @gab.ath

‚Äî
Lemon Post is a post-production studio specialising in 
colour grading and editing for film, commercials, and 
branded content.

üîó lemonpost.studio | Link in bio

project.title: Virgin Media It's A Steal
project.description: A fast-paced, comedic ad where a burglar‚Äôs night takes an unexpected turn ‚Äì instead of making a getaway, they end up securing an incredible Virgin Media deal for their friends. A playful take on how irresistible the offers are! This was such a fun project to film, balancing tight timing with sharp storytelling to pack humor and energy into every second.

project.title: The Newspaper
project.description: In a pristine 1950s suburb, a newlywed discovers cryptic puzzles in the daily newspaper that hint at a buried town secret and her husband‚Äôs past. As the clues unravel, so does her reality. The Newspaper is a suspenseful descent into appearances, trust, and the quiet power of uncovering the truth.

project.title: Squid Campaign 2025
project.description: After a successful collaboration with SQUID the year before, I was commissioned to lead their 2025 crowdfunding campaign. We traveled to Dublin to capture the story behind SQUID, meeting with the founders and crafting a dynamic video that blends motion graphics, live action, and animation. The video highlights SQUID‚Äôs innovative approach to digital loyalty cards and introduces Wave, their new feature designed to reward users seamlessly through purchases. The goal was to create an engaging and compelling piece to drive the campaign forward - and we did just that.

project.title: Pink Taxi
project.description: One day Apostolis decides that he wants to be a superhero. He creates a suit that allows him to teleport but only once per day. His flatmate Vezos needs transportation in order to go to a very important job interview, Apostolis offers to help but Vezos refuses to believe that his flatmate suddenly turned into a superhero.
awards: Best Comedy: Symi International Film Festival 2021
Best Short Film: Symi International Film Festival 2021
Best Greek Film: Symi International Film Festival 2021
Honorable Mention London World-Wide Comedy Short Film Festival 2019

project.title: Astoria
project.description: Three years after a traumatic event that changed her life Kelly, a young girl, returns to her hometown Kastoria and to her friends whom she has left behind. At the same time, a curious case of a hit-and-run accident, that had shaken the town, is opened once again.
awards: Best Student Film Nomination - Hellenic Greek Academy 2023
Best Director - Athens Digital Film Festival 2023
